description.value:
Over a long rest, you can undergo a ritual to reprogram yourself to a new alpha who is taking the long rest with you. You must succeed on a Presence (Save) check with your current alpha's Presence Attribute as the DC. At the end of the rest, should you succeed, you gain 1 level of @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.ERBR3AG01H4N1L91]{Exhaustion} and your alpha is changed. 
If your current alpha does not approve of this change, the DC is increased by +5, and you gain 2 levels of @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.ERBR3AG01H4N1L91]{Exhaustion} instead.
